caption:
"A ceramic toilet with white coloring and a rounded, compact shape. Features a standard tank and bowl design with a smooth surface. Used for sanitary purposes in bathrooms. Positioned adjacent to a shower area and near a towel rack."

"A possibly metallic container-type object with silver coloring and cylindrical shape. Has a textured surface and appears to be mounted on the wall. Likely used for holding bathroom accessories. Located next to a toilet and beneath a towel rack."

"A ceramic toilet with white coloring and an elongated shape. Features a standard tank and bowl design with a smooth surface. Used for sanitary purposes in bathrooms. Positioned against a wall and near a radiator."

"A metallic container-type object with silver coloring and cylindrical shape. Has a textured surface and appears to be mounted on the wall. Likely used for holding bathroom accessories. Located next to a toilet and beneath a towel rack."

"A ceramic toilet with white coloring and a rounded, compact shape. Features a standard tank and bowl design with a smooth surface. Used for sanitary purposes in bathrooms. Positioned adjacent to a shower area and near a towel rack."
